subject: Kentucky Tobacco & Health Research Institute Seminar
message: Dr. Di Marco has asked me to advise you of the presentation schedule for the morning session of the Kentucky Tobacco & Health Research Institute seminar which will be held on May 17, 1983 at the Bowman Gray Technical Center beginning at 8:00 am.

schedule.topic: Overview of Kentucky Tobacco and Health Research Institute
Systems for Simultaneous Exposure to Mainstream and Sidestream Smoke From A Single Cigarette
Cigarette Smoke Aerosol Size Distribution and Coagulation
Cigarette Smoking, Inflammation and Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
Effect of Cigarette Smoke and Nicotine Aerosols on Control of Breathing
Multiplicity of Animal Brain Nicotine-Binding Sites

note: If you have any questions regarding the seminar, please let me know.
